question: Which Indian sportsperson has clinched Gold in the 10-metre air pistol event at the 2018 Youth Olympic Games?
explanation: On October 10, Pistol shooter Saurabh Chaudhary clinched Gold in the 10-metre air pistol event at the 3rd edition of  Summer Youth Olympic Games 2018 in  Buenos Aires, Argentina. It is India’s third gold medal in the history of Youth Olympic Games (UOG) and all three have come in this edition in Buenos Aires. Earlier, Shooter Manu Bhaker became the first shooter from India to claim a gold  at the ongoing event. She finished on top of the podium in women’s 10m air pistol event with a score of 236.5. While, Weightlifter Jeremy Lalrinnunga won India\'s first ever youth Olympics Gold.
